anathema: Abandon your community, neglect those in your care, torment animals
edict: Aid your community, protect those you have authority over, treat animals with respect

<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Rowdrosh (The Herdsman)](/Deities.aspx?ID=652)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>

</traits>

**Source** [Divine Mysteries Web Supplement](/Sources.aspx?ID=237) pg. 12

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Empyreal Lords](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=10)

**Edicts** Aid your community, protect those you have authority over, treat animals with respect

**Anathema** Abandon your community, neglect those in your care, torment animals

**Area of Concern**
Animal husbandry, herd animals, shepherds

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Attribute](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Constitution or Wisdom

**Divine Font** [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Sanctification** can choose holy

**Divine Skill** [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=43)

**Favored Weapon** [Staff](/Weapons.aspx?ID=367)

**Domains** [Family](/Domains.aspx?ID=74), [Nature](/Domains.aspx?ID=85), [Protection](/Domains.aspx?ID=90), [Travel](/Domains.aspx?ID=93)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Summon Animal](/Spells.aspx?ID=1694)

- **2nd**
[Speak with Animals](/Spells.aspx?ID=1680)

- **2nd**
[Animal Form](/Spells.aspx?ID=1440)

</column>
name: Rowdrosh (The Herdsman)
